Producers.title: Jawbox Spirits Co Ltd
Producers.overview: Jawbox is a classic dry gin made in a traditional distillery set in a wooded estate just outside the city of Belfast.
Producers.address: 155-157 Donegall Pass, Belfast, Co Antrim, BT7 1DT
Producers.detailed:
In homes across Belfast deep boxy Belfast sinks began to appear. In many homes it was the focal point of the kitche - the place where many conversations were held. And so it got its nickname - 'The Jawbox'
Greatness through graft and craft is the spirit which inspired the creation of Jawbox.
A gin brand for the adventurous, the confident, the curious - created for those who enjoy every moment
